participant_1.background:
I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
I'm trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I am a peaceful hippo who only wants to swim and eat, but I will defend myself if I have to.
I'm doing well in school, but I wish the weather was warmer.
i enjoy playing guitar and video games.

participant_2.background:
I like to use websites that help me learn about music and color theory.
i also eat too much french fries.
I want to take my uniform off and relax.
My longest relationship was with my wife, but she doesn't like me anymore.
I am single, but I am happy and content with my life, because I have my writing to keep me busy.

content.text: Pretty good! I'm just trying to figure out how I'm going to treat my mom for her birthday this weekend.
Oh, that's awesome! What are you thinking of doing?
I'm not sure yet, but I want to do something special for her. She's been through a lot with her cancer, and I want to show her how much I appreciate her.
That's so sweet of you! I'm sure she'll love whatever you do.
Thanks! I hope so. I'm also trying to find a way to make more time for my kids, but it's hard when I'm so busy with work.
I know how you feel. I'm a single parent, and it's hard to balance work and family life.
Yeah, it's tough. But I know it's important to make time for my kids, so I'm trying to do my best.
That's all you can do. Just keep trying, and you'll figure it out.
No problem! What are you doing for work?
I'm a teacher. I teach music at a local elementary school.
Oh, that's cool! I love music.
Me too! I'm glad I get to share my love of music with kids.
That's awesome! I'm sure you make a difference in their lives.
